thread.title: Keeping things simple works for rock's Bottle Rockets
thread.title_full: Keeping things simple works for rock's Bottle Rockets

title: Keeping things simple works for rock's Bottle Rockets
text: > Entertainment Keeping things simple works for rock's Bottle Rockets In this undated image released by Bloodshot Records, members of The Bottle Rockets, from left, Keith Voegele, John Horton, Brian Henneman and Mark Ortmann pose in St. Louis, Mo. The Missouri-based roots rock band released a new album ,"South Broadway Athletic Club," named for the St. Louis location where Henneman took his wife to a wrestling match on their first date. (Todd Fox/Bloodshot Records via AP)
